org.bremersee.data.ldaptive

Class LdaptiveTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bremersee.data.ldaptive.LdaptiveTemplate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LdaptiveOperations

    public class LdaptiveTemplate
extends Object
implements LdaptiveOperations
    The template for executing ldap operations.
    Author:
    Christian Bremer
